title: One Piece Ep. 374 Recap: Our Bodies Vanish! The Morning Sun Shines on the Nightmarish Island!
author: The Adult Swim Squad
description: Detailed episode recap covering the climactic battle between Luffy and Moria, including analysis of the Gigant Jet Shell technique and the dramatic cliffhanger ending.

title: One Piece Episode 374 Review
author: deculture
description: Contemporary review from the episode's original air date, analyzing the pacing, animation quality, and key moments of the battle. Notes improved animation quality and the dramatic visual of characters beginning to vanish.

title: One Piece: 10 Things That Made No Sense About The Thriller Bark Arc

description: Analysis article examining narrative elements and potential plot holes in the Thriller Bark arc, providing context for episodes including 374.

author: CBR Staff
description: Analysis of Thriller Bark arc's tonal balance between horror and comedy elements, examining how the arc blends gothic atmosphere with One Piece's characteristic humor.

title: The 10 Strongest Heroes In One Piece's Thriller Bark Saga, Ranked
author: CBR Staff
description: Power ranking analysis of protagonist characters during the Thriller Bark saga, contextualizing Luffy's strength and techniques including the Gigant Jet Shell.

title: One Piece's Thriller Bark Finale Showcases a Team Battle Like No Other in Shonen
author: CBR Staff
description: Analysis of the collaborative fighting strategy employed by the Straw Hats against Oars and Moria, highlighting the teamwork aspects that precede the final one-on-one battle in episode 374.

title: Eiichiro Oda Just Redeemed 1 of One Piece's Most Controversial Arcs
author: CBR Staff
description: Recent analysis connecting Moria's backstory and the God Valley incident to Thriller Bark, providing new context for Moria's character and motivations shown in episode 374.

title: The Most Over The Top Story Arcs In One Piece
author: GameRant Staff
description: Article discussing One Piece's most action-packed and outlandish story arcs, including Thriller Bark and the Nightmare Luffy/giant Moria confrontations.

title: Luffy's Best Gear 3 Moments in One Piece, Ranked
author: CBR Staff
description: Ranking of Luffy's most memorable Gear 3 attacks throughout the series, featuring analysis of the Gigant Jet Shell technique from episode 374.
